title: Ceiling Paper, 1900
creditline: Gift of Sylvia Goodrich in memory of her grandparents, Orlando R. and Elizabeth Boyd Ballou
description: Small-scale floral in brown, peach and white, over mica fill of tiny flowers, on pastel blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ceiling Paper, 1900.
1900. Machine-printed. Gift of Sylvia Goodrich in memory of her grandparents, Orlando R. and Elizabeth Boyd Ballou. 1973-32-6.
